description: Traffic lights at the Botley Interchange on the A34 were damaged following a vehicle collision.
title: Oxford: Traffic lights out of action at A34 Botley Interchange
title_page: Oxford: Traffic lights out of action at A34 Botley Interchange - BBC News
maintext:
Traffic lights on part of an intersection on a busy A-road have been damaged after a road crash.
National Highways said the traffic lights at the Botley Interchange on the A34 near Oxford were damaged following a collision about 08:00 GMT on Thursday.
The westbound lights are not functioning but the eastbound lights are unaffected.
A spokesperson for the National Highways said: "Our engineers are in attendance to assess the damaged control box and will be working to fix the lights as soon as possible."
